messages.feature-disabled:
Broken link detection is currently disabled.
Please contact your administrator to enable it via
Settings > SEO > Detect broken links.

broken-link-delete.title: Confirm delete
broken-link-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this broken link?
broken-link-delete.messagePlural: Are you sure you want to delete selected broken links?

broken-link-save.title: Save changes
broken-link-save.message: This entity has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

redirect-rule-delete.title: Confirm delete
redirect-rule-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this redirect rule?
redirect-rule-delete.messagePlural: Are you sure you want to delete selected redirect rules?

redirect-rule-save.title: Save changes
redirect-rule-save.message: This entity has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

Enabled.title: Detect broken links
Enabled.description: Should the platform record requests to non-existent pages
